price: 18. (Ayebisi) bango: Bopesa ngai bawumbu ya Allah, nazali motindami malamu epai na bino.
arabic: أَنۡ أَدُّوٓاْ إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: an addū ilayya ʿibāda al-lahi innī lakum rasūlun amīnun
